titleStmt.title: The reward of diligence By Lewes Sharpe, rector of Moreton-Hampstead in the county of Devon.
titleStmt.author: Sharpe, Lewes.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for James Collins in the Temple-passage from Essex Street,

notesStmt.note: Copy closely trimmed with slight loss of print.
